alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 19 at 3:10PM AKST until November 21 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 3 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Shishmaref, Little Diomede and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to 3 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur along south facing shores. Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southerly gales will spread north over the the Northern Bering Sea and the Chukchi Sea Late tonight and continue into Monday night, then decrease slowly on Tue. This will cause sea levels to rise several feet above normal and waves will push to the top of the beach. The worst conditions will be along south facing shores.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
